description: Manage 'Azure AD authenticate as ARM' policy for Azure Container Registries.

commands.name: az acr config authentication-as-arm show
commands.summary: Show the configured 'Azure AD authenticate as ARM' policy for an Azure Container Registry.
examples: az acr config authentication-as-arm show -r myregistry

commands.name: az acr config authentication-as-arm update
commands.summary: Update 'Azure AD authenticate as ARM' policy for an Azure Container Registry.
commands.syntax:
az acr config authentication-as-arm update --registry
                                           [--resource-group]
                                           [--status {disabled, enabled}]
examples: az acr config authentication-as-arm update -r myregistry --status Disabled
az acr config authentication-as-arm update -r myregistry --status Enabled
